column2: Alpha Black to Papa Bear. Requesting ARA air support mission at Alverna coordinates. Over.
Papa Bear, this is Alpha Black. Alverna and the seaport are in friendly hands. Over.
Papa Bear to Alpha Black. Roger that. Dispatching gunships to Alverna area right now. Out.
Papa Bear here. We copy you. Good work, Alpha Black.
Alpha Black, with Alverna in NATO hands, the worm is starting to turn. Nice work. Papa Bear out.
McKenzie, Regular, at Red Army Base.
